name: 21 Steps to Soul
description: Classic old-school hardcore two dimensional horror platformer. Following Daniel in this God forsaken world, the players are going to collect the elements to open doors, run for their dear lives from the evil monsters and make their way further and further into the darkness.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows /7/8/8.1/10 both x86 and x64 Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9300 or equivalent Memory: 2000 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 or equivalent Storage: 105 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows /7/8/8.1/10 both x86 and x64 Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9300 or equivalent Memory: 2000 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 or equivalent Storage: 105 MB available space
